backend/main.mo: Actor stores and retrieves canister IDs per caller using a map with a trap on missing entries.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature changes, affected files, components, and test IDs for multiple site enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of major frontend files including landing components, styles, Tailwind config, and documentation.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining DNS and boundary node steps to map a custom domain to the deployed IC canister.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base with OKLCH blueâ€‘white theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, page title, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Landing page UI with hero, donation, and themed sections using ElectroBeez branding and assets.
frontend/src/components/landing/SectionN: Sticky navigation bar with logo, smooth-scroll links, contact info, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an IC backend actor, updating when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state handling. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes status flags for login flow.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes. Applies global styles for borders, background, and text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider. Loads global CSS and renders App at the root.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens using OKLCH CSS variables, adding custom colors, animations, and plugins. Enables class-based dark mode and specifies content paths.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata describing a funding landing page build, including features, requirements, image tasks, and project state version info.
